pages.text: Several gems require $(thing)Polishing/$ in order to be used. $(thing)Polishing/$, whether done manually or automatically, requires some form of $(item)Sand Paper/$, which can be created from any form of $(item)Sand/$, or from $(item)Diamonds/$ to make the much more durable $(item)Diamond Grit Sandpaper/$.

pages.title: Manual Sanding
pages.text: Holding $(bold)Right Click/$ while holding any form of $(item)Sand Paper/$ will $(thing)Polish/$ any items held in the $(bold)Off Hand/$, or resting on the floor in front of you.

pages.title: Automatic Sanding
pages.text: $(item)Sand Paper can also be applied automatically by using a $(bold)$(l:advanced_automation/adv_devices#deployer)Deployer/$. $(ponder_link) the $(item)Deployer/$ for more information.
